description:
*Update: What's new? Read further down.*
Statter is designed to be an all-in-one WebOS Information Center. Get the current GPS status, current Internet Connection status and current Time status all in one place. This App will also show you your Wifi IP Address, your WAN IP Address, your Unique Device ID (to identify your Device in case of stolen), the current system Time in Seconds, your current set Date, your current Timezone, UTC Time, Network Time, Network Time Zone, Device Name, Display Resolution, Keyboard Type, Device Serial Number, General Device Info and your current ringtones set. Set Blink Notifications, Show alerts when looked and LED Throbber in one Place. Many other misc features. With weekly updates a lot of more features will come. Any suggestions or problems installing please mail to mail@j-liebl.de or use the Support Page in the App itself. *New in 1.1.5: Support for HP Touchpad and Pre 3*
